name: Koko
overview: Koko is an platform game, developed and published by Aackosoft, which was released in Europe in 1985. You are Koko and diligently searching for the Magic Ball that can fulfill all your wishes. But, as always with wishes, you have to do something to get them, not only do you have to exchange the blue sky for a musty subterranean cave, but you also have to take out the patrolling robots and an immortal guard before you can find the Ball and the 23 treasures. can cherish. And that takes a lot! A refreshing adventure game.
